title: Lead Software Engineer with AI Expertise
job_description:
Job Title: Lead Software Engineer with AI Expertise


Job Description:

v01.tech is seeking a dynamic and highly skilled Lead Software Engineer to join our growing team. As our first engineering hire, you will play a pivotal role in transforming our MVP into a robust, scalable, and fully-released product. This is a unique opportunity to shape the future of our technology stack and have a significant impact on the company's direction and success. Additionally, you will spearhead the integration of AI-driven features to create dynamic journeys and communications.


Responsibilities:

  • Lead Development Efforts: Drive the development of our marketing automation platform from MVP to a fully released product.
  • Technical Strategy: Make key decisions on the technology stack, ensuring the use of modern, efficient, and scalable technologies.
  • Architecture Design: Design and implement a scalable architecture to support current and future features.
  • Full-Stack Development: Work across the stack, from front-end interfaces to back-end systems and databases.
  • API Development: Develop and maintain robust APIs (RESTful and/or GraphQL) to support platform integrations.
  • Cloud Infrastructure: Manage and optimize our cloud infrastructure (AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure) and ensure high availability and performance.
  • DevOps Practices: Implement CI/CD pipelines, containerization (Docker), and orchestration (Kubernetes) to streamline development and deployment processes.
  • Data Management: Oversee database design, management, and optimization (PostgreSQL, MongoDB).
  • AI Integration: Develop and implement AI-driven features to dynamically create user journeys and communications.
  • Machine Learning Models: Build and maintain machine learning models for predictive analytics and personalized marketing automation.
  • Mentorship: Provide guidance and mentorship to future engineering hires as the team grows.
  • Collaboration: Work closely with the product, design, and marketing teams to align development efforts with business goals.
  • Innovation: Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies to ensure our platform remains cutting-edge.


Qualifications:

  • Experience: 3-5 years of experience in a similar role, preferably in a startup or small team environment.
  • Technical Expertise: Proficiency in modern programming languages and frameworks (JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, React, Next.js, Node.js).
  • Database Skills: Strong experience with SQL and NoSQL databases (PostgreSQL, MongoDB).
  • DevOps Knowledge: Hands-on experience with cloud services, containerization, and CI/CD pipelines.
  • API Development: Expertise in creating and managing APIs (RESTful and/or GraphQL).
  • AI and Machine Learning: Experience with machine learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch) and AI integration in production systems.
  • Problem-Solving: Excellent problem-solving skills with the ability to troubleshoot complex issues.
  • Communication: Strong verbal and written communication skills.
  • Adaptability: Ability to learn new technologies quickly and adapt to changing requirements.
  • Leadership: Proven ability to lead and mentor a team.


Nice to Have:

  • Marketing Technology: Background in marketing technology or automation platforms.
  • Data Science: Advanced knowledge in data science and analytics.


Cultural Fit:

  • Entrepreneurial Mindset: A self-starter who thrives in a fast-paced, evolving environment.
  • Team Player: Collaborative and able to work well within a team.
  • Passion for Innovation: A genuine interest in marketing automation and technology innovation.


What We Offer:

  • Flexible Work Environment: The opportunity to work remotely or in a hybrid setting.
  • Impactful Role: The chance to make a significant impact on the company’s growth and direction.
  • Growth Opportunities: Potential for career growth as the team expands.
  • Competitive Compensation: A competitive salary and benefits package.


If you’re a visionary engineer with a passion for innovation, AI, and a desire to drive technological excellence, we’d love to hear from you. Join us at v01.tech and help us revolutionize the marketing automation industry!


To apply, please send your resume and a brief cover letter explaining your interest in the role.

title: Quality Control Engineer
job_description:
About Us:

We are a dynamic Vietnamese software startup making waves in the global tech scene. Our innovative solutions leverage AI and cutting-edge technologies to create products that positively impact both humanity and the environment. We offer a collaborative, remote-first work environment where talent is nurtured and career growth opportunities abound.

Your Role:

As an Automation QA Engineer, you will play a vital role in ensuring the quality and reliability of our software products. Your expertise in end-to-end (E2E) testing, automation frameworks, and testing tools will be crucial in identifying and preventing defects throughout the software development lifecycle. You will work closely with developers and other QA team members to design, develop, and execute automated tests that ensure our products meet the highest standards of quality.

Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and maintain automated E2E tests for frontend and backend applications using Playwright or similar tools.
  • Create comprehensive test plans and test cases that cover all aspects of the software functionality.
  • Execute automated tests, analyze test results, and report defects to the development team.
  • Collaborate with developers to troubleshoot and resolve issues identified during testing.
  • Implement and maintain a robust test automation framework for efficient and scalable testing.
  • Continuously improve test coverage and effectiveness by identifying and addressing gaps in testing.
  • Utilize testing tools like Qase and JMeter to enhance test execution and reporting.
  • Participate in Agile development processes (ScrumBan) using Jira and Git.
  • Communicate effectively in English with team members and stakeholders.

Requirements:

Essential:

  • Strong proficiency in JavaScript or TypeScript and experience with Playwright or similar E2E testing frameworks.
  • Deep understanding of testing methodologies, strategies, and best practices.
  • Experience in designing and implementing test automation frameworks.
  • Familiarity with Git, Jira, and testing tools like Qase and JMeter.
  • Excellent English communication skills (both written and verbal).

Optional:

  • Experience with backend testing (API testing, database testing).
  • Knowledge of performance testing and security testing.
  • Experience with CI/CD pipelines and test integration.

Benefits:

  • Competitive salary: We offer an attractive compensation package commensurate with your skills and experience.
  • 13th-month salary and bonuses: Receive additional financial rewards for your contributions.
  • Performance-based incentives: Your hard work and achievements will be recognized and rewarded.
  • Flexible work arrangements: Work remotely from anywhere, anytime, with occasional team building and client meetings in Vietnam.
  • Professional development: We invest in your growth by providing opportunities for learning and skill enhancement.
  • Impactful work: Be part of a team creating solutions that make a difference in the world.

To Apply:

If you are passionate about quality assurance and want to contribute to meaningful projects, we encourage you to apply! Please send your resume and a cover letter highlighting your relevant experience to Phuong Lambert phuong@optimalitypro.com

title: SEO Manager
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
job_description:
The Wise Seeker is the leading HR technology company in unbiased talent evaluation.

With over 15 years in the industry analyzing the needs and demands of the job market, we are capable of identifying the best talent for each company thanks to our team of professionals and our SaaS platform integrated with Artificial Intelligence.

We are efficient, evaluate talent objectively without bias, and close hiring times in record time, delivering optimal results.

We are looking for a SEO Manager for an Australian-based online startup that is using cutting-edge AI to digitize and democratize the legal market.

Location: Remote, based in Ho Chi Minh City

Personnel in charge: 5 people, including content writers, link builders, and social media.

Functions

  • Conduct keyword research to identify high-volume, relevant keywords for our target audience.
  • Analyze website traffic data and user behavior using SEO tools to understand our strengths and weaknesses.
  • Develop and implement a comprehensive SEO strategy to improve organic search ranking and website visibility.
  • Optimize website content for target keywords using on-page SEO best practices.
  • Manage and improve the website's technical SEO health, ensuring proper crawling and indexation by search engines.
  • Build high-quality backlinks through link-building outreach and content marketing initiatives.
  • Monitor and analyze SEO performance metrics, including organic traffic, keyword rankings, and conversions.
  • Stay up-to-date on the latest SEO trends and algorithm updates.
  • Collaborate with content creators, web developers, and other marketing team members to ensure a cohesive SEO strategy.
  • Prepare weekly reports on SEO performance and make data-driven recommendations for improvement.

Requirements

  • Minimum 5 years of experience as an SEO Manager or related role.
  • Proven track record of success in increasing organic traffic and website visibility ranking #1 results (international SEO)
  • Strong understanding of SEO best practices, including keyword research, on-page optimization, and link building.
  • Experience with SEO tools and analytics platforms (e.g., Google Search Console, Ahrefs, SEMrush).
  • Excellent communication, written and verbal, with the ability to explain technical SEO concepts to non-technical audiences.
  • Analytical mind with a data-driven approach to problem-solving.
  • Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
  • Strong organizational skills and a meticulous attention to detail.

Benefits

  • Attractive Salary & Bonus based on performance
  • Opportunities for professional growth
  • Work under a contractor basis, full time remote.

title: Senior Back-end Developer (AI/ML Product)
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
job_description:
This is a remote position.

Our partner is a leader in the world of test and measurement, industrial automation, and life science instruments. With more than 100 years of experience in measuring and controlling industrial processes, they encourage companies to unlock their full potential by providing innovative solutions.

They are seeking a Senior AI/ML Backend Engineer to join the team. This role is pivotal in developing and maintaining server-side application logic, building efficient streaming systems, and ensuring the platform's scalability, performance, and security. The ideal candidate will have a robust understanding of backend development, microservices architecture, and cloud-native applications.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Maintain server-side logic using clean code practices and object-oriented design.
  • Debug and troubleshoot within a microservice architecture.
  • Build and optimize streaming systems with Apache Kafka.
  • Ensure high availability, fault tolerance, and scalability.
  • Design and optimize relational and time-series databases.
  • Develop and manage multi-tenant systems for effective resource management and data isolation.
  • Design and implement Restful APIs and gRPC for web and internal applications.
  • Ensure scalability and performance using Kubernetes.
  • Monitor and optimize system performance with appropriate tools.
  • Participate in code reviews.
  • Develop cloud-native applications on AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.

Requirements

  • Minimum 5 years of experience in backend development.
  • Proven experience with clean code practices, multi-threading, and asynchronous programming.
  • Proficient in .NetCore & Java.
  • Experience in building streaming systems.
  • Proficiency in relational and time-series databases (SQL Server, PostgreSQL).
  • Experience with multi-tenant systems development.
  • Strong knowledge and hands-on experience with Apache Kafka and system architecture design.
  • Expertise in designing and implementing Restful APIs and gRPC.
  • Proficiency with Kubernetes (k8s) and cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud).
  • Understanding of basic machine learning concepts.
  • Strong commitment to continuous learning and staying updated with industry trends.

Benefits

  • 13th-month salary
  • Generous offer for potential candidate
  • Top-notch laptop and equipment
  • Performance bonus program
  • Remote work flexibility
  • Continuous learning and development
  • Collaborative and supportive work environment

job_description:
Welocalize is an award-winning localization and data transformation company. We run one of the world’s largest Ads Rating Programs and we want you to join!

As an Ads Quality Rater, you will review and grade internet advertisements to help shape how ads are delivered to the end users. In other words, you’ll tell the AI program how good or bad its advertisement suggestions are based on the user’s keywords.

You will review ads in both English and Vietnamese

This Role Is Great For People Who

  • Surf the internet daily
  • Use major search engines frequently
  • Know what people want based on a few keywords
  • Enjoy researching topics online
  • Want a flexible and fun side job

Project Details

Job Title: Ads Quality Rater

Pay Rate: Based on tasks (approximately $5 per hour)

Location: Remote/work from home - must be based in Vietnam

Hours: Set your schedule based on the following – Minimum commitment is 5 hours per week. You can choose to work up to 20 hours per week.

Start Date: ASAP

Employment Type: Independent Contractor/Freelance/Self-Employed

Project Duration: Long-term

Note

  • Even though the position is WFH, you must reside in the country that is noted in this description. This will be automatically checked during the hiring process.

Recruitment Process

  • There is no formal interview for this job! No phone calls, no waiting, and no wasting time wondering whether you got the job or not.
  • Instead, you will be guided through a self-paced and automated recruitment process.

IMPORTANT NOTE: Welocalize uses numerous identity checks to ensure that everyone who makes the team is real, qualified, and ready to work. To avoid any misunderstandings, do not use IP masking programs (such as VPNs).

Experience & Requirements

  • Fluency in Vietnamese
  • Strong understanding of English (written and spoken)
  • Comfortable knowledge of modern popular culture
  • Reliable computer system and internet connection
  • Familiar with using online search engines
  • Sign a standard Non-Disclosure Agreement and Service Level Agreement

Please note that this work is based on project needs. Due to this, weekly hours may vary and flexibility with change is expected. You must legally be able to work on freelance projects in Vietnam.

To know more details (Click here)

title: Content writer - Freelance AI Tutor (Chinese)
industries: Non-profit Organizations and Primary and Secondary Education
job_description:
If you're a professional who works with text, we have an exciting opportunity to use your writing, editing, technical, and creative skills in a new and innovative way. As an AI Tutor - Writer, you won't just be writing; you'll be helping to shape the future of AI.

We're seeking freelance writers, copywriters, and wordsmiths to collaborate with us in creating a diverse range of content. This role is more than traditional copywriting; it involves training AI systems by crafting text that teaches and informs their responses.

As an AI Tutor - Writer you will use your writing skills to create text on a wide range of topics. Working within our style guide, you will create responses that will form the ‘voice' for future AI. You will create original, helpful, honest, harmless text responses and you'll fact check your work using verifiable sources.

Requirements

  • You have some professional or educational experience in creative writing, copywriting or editing in Chinese
  • Your level of Chinese is native or proficiency (C2)
  • Your level of English is upper-intermediate (B2) or above
  • You have a degree in communications, linguistics, literature, journalism, or similar
  • You are ready to learn new methods, able to switch between projects and topics quickly and sometimes work with challenging, complex guidelines
  • Our freelance role is fully remote so, you just need a laptop, internet connection, time available and enthusiasm to take on a challenge


Benefits

  • Take part in part-time, remote, freelance projects that respect your primary professional or academic commitments
  • Try your hand at an AI project and enrich your portfolio with new experiences
  • Make a tangible impact on the quality of AI

title: VIETNAM REAL ESTATE RESEARCH - ASSOCIATE INTERN (NON-PAID)
industries: Venture Capital and Private Equity Principals
job_description:
VIETNAM REAL ESTATE RESEARCH - ASSOCIATE INTERN (NON-PAID)

Specific Role Requirements (pls read CAREFULLY)

  • We are looking specifically for role: VIETNAM REAL ESTATE RESEARCH (under Real Estate Unit)
  • Work involves, but not limited to: property, regulation, & local residential market research, investors/client outreach, site visits, etc.
  • Skills required: Residential property research, market research, onsite/offsite survey, potential client outreach, etc.
  • NOTE: Candidates should be physically located in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. 
  • Please MUST READ the Role Overview section below for details​.
Role Overview (must Read)

​* Rouge International & Rouge Ventures are an equal opportunity employer * 


Company Description

Rouge International & Rouge Ventures is a venture capital firm that offers professional services on sustainability/innovations funding, turnaround advisory, agtech accelerator, vietnam real estate operations for VCs/startups/corp execs, etc. With an emphasis on sustainability and innovations ventures, Rouge International guides businesses towards a brighter future.


About the internship program

The company aims at finding the best young talents to assist in global challenges on venture capital advisory, investor intelligence, sustainability/ESG, AI, innovation startups and communities, overseas real estate ventures, etc.


Hard and soft skills enhancement for interns

Depending on the assigned unit, the Associate Intern will generally be responsible for assisting in various day-to-day work such as: researching, on/offsite market intelligence investigation, leveraging new tech or AI tools, internal and external party relationships, new developments of business & technology objectives, influencer/communications management, etc. The role also involves supporting administrative tasks, collaboration with internal or external parties, conducting meetings, managing people/teams, external site visits, etc. This internship role is remote and provides the opportunity to gain valuable experience in a fast-paced, innovative environment.


Each role for each unit is unique. Please READ CAREFULLY about the specific role requirements BEFORE you apply.


Introduction to our various Units:

This is a general overview of Units in our company for your better understanding.

Please READ CAREFULLY which position you are applying for.


  • AI Unit: Identifying and using AI tools to solve various challenges from all Units for corp operational efficiency. Good at business and programming skills (eg. C++, Python, AI language modelling, APIs, etc) required.
  • Influencer Unit: Strategic management of our influencers and corp social media accounts to promote our objectives.
  • Management Unit: Top mgt level assist to Managing Director, strategic management of all units and enhancing operational efficiency
  • Real Estate Unit: Managing all aspects of our Vietnam real estate/property investment venture capital and portfolios. May require offsite work (eg. surveying, investigations, etc). Candidates should be physically located within Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam for this Unit.
  • Agtech Accelerator Unit: Managing agtech startups for partnerships, test and research within our rice fields in Thailand. Candidates should be physically located in Thailand for this Unit.
  • Technology Unit: System development of our FUTURE Engine, programming and inclusion of new AI developments, APIs, etc. Programming skills (eg. C++, Python, AI language modelling, APIs, etc), cyber tracking, due diligence, cyber forensics, required.
  • VC Scouting Unit: Strategic identification of suitable investment portfolio companies, network & collaboration with Scouting Agents, gathering intelligence.  


General Qualifications

  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills; good & CLEAR English (written and verbal)
  • Good professional attitude, responsible, team player, independent, disciplined, strong leaders
  • Ability to work independently, efficiently and effectively in a remote team environment; motivating others & be a leader
  • Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail
  • Proficiency in various tools like Microsoft Office, Google Suite, or other AI new tools, etc
  • Physically located in Asia time zones preferred (Between GMT+5 to GMT+12)


Notes

  • Please make sure your CV is in ENGLISH
  • Standard internship period is 6-12+ months (or more if you can, so you will learn and can rotate work)
  • Remote working online, flexible timing (may require outside work)
  • This is a Non-Paid internship; you will experience many aspects which you normally wouldn't in other companies/industries
  • Reference letter provided upon satisfactory completion
  • We may allocate you to other units, depending on the best use of your skills and future personal growth
  • More details on this role or other positions: https://www.rougevc.com/careers

title: Senior Technical Support Engineer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD
place: Ho Chi Minh City Metropolitan Area
job_function: Engineering, Information Technology, and Customer Service
industries: Computer Hardware Manufacturing, Software Development, and IT Services and IT Consulting
job_description:
Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, Trilogy. Have you got what it takes?

In the fast-paced world of enterprise software, traditional customer support methods often fall short of excellence. Support engineers often find themselves bogged down in repetitive troubleshooting, limited by the narrow scope of their product expertise. Data shows that over 60% of support tickets are escalated due to inadequate problem-solving skills or a lack of product knowledge. This not only frustrates customers but also stifles the growth and satisfaction of support agents.

At Trilogy, we’ve reimagined customer support with the power of AI. Managing over 100 unique enterprise software products, we leverage advanced AI tools to streamline troubleshooting and enhance problem-solving capabilities. Our AI-driven approach not only helps diagnose issues faster but also provides intelligent insights and solutions, making our support team exceptionally efficient and effective. Our AI-powered chatbot crushes most tickets, so only the most complicated customer issues will be escalated to you.

The issues you face in this role will be challenging and diverse, requiring solutions that may involve configuration, database adjustments, or even code-level fixes. This is not a role for those who prefer to stick to familiar routines or spend months mastering a single product. We seek self-starters who can quickly adapt, troubleshoot efficiently, and continuously learn on the job. If you are someone who gets frustrated by rigid processes or needs extensive hand-holding, this is not the right fit for you.

You will be a crucial part of the Trilogy Support team, directly contributing to our reputation for exceptional customer service. This position offers a unique opportunity to advance your career rapidly by developing deep technical expertise across a wide array of products. If you are ready to embrace a challenging yet rewarding role where you can make a significant impact, we encourage you to apply.

What You Will Be Doing

  • AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
  • AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
  • Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

What You Won’t Be Doing

  • Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
  • Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role

Senior Technical Support Engineer Key Responsibilities

  • Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve

Basic Requirements

  • At least 4 total years of experience in a technical customer support or engineering role
  • While this is NOT a coding-heavy role, you will still need to be able to read and write code at a basic level for debugging purposes
  • Experience using generative AI tools (e.g., ChatGPT, Bing, Claude, Bard) in a professional setting

About Trilogy

Hundreds of software businesses run on the Trilogy Business Platform. For three decades, Trilogy has been known for 3 things: Relentlessly seeking top talent, Innovating new technology, and incubating new businesses. Our technological innovation is spearheaded by a passion for simple customer-facing designs. Our incubation of new businesses ranges from entirely new moon-shot ideas to rearchitecting existing projects for today's modern cloud-based stack. Trilogy is a place where you can be surrounded with great people, be proud of doing great work, and grow your career by leaps and bounds.

There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!

Working with Crossover

This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover. The compensation level for this role is $30 USD/hour, which equates to $60,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.

What to expect next:

  • You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.
  • Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online “screening” assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.

Important! If you do not receive an email from us:

  • First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again.
  • Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as “Not Spam” since you will receive other emails as well.
  • Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.
  • If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/password-recovery if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply.

Crossover Job Code: LJ-3330-VN-HoChiMin-SeniorTechnica1.001

title: Software Engineer for AI Training Data (Swift)
job_description:
Accepted Locations

We are accepting applicants from the US, Canada, and most countries in LATAM and Europe. We are accepting some countries in Africa and Asia. For the full list of accepted locations click here. This work is 100% remote.

Loom Video

Our Founder/CEO, Gabe Greenberg, created a more in depth Loom video that we highly recommend you watch! Check it out here: https://www.loom.com/share/5a8972c7fbbf46aaa3f389b2b6391c40

Job Overview

We are currently seeking Swift Developers for project-specific roles focused on RLHF. This role will play a key part in our reinforcement learning from human feedback (RLHF) initiatives, contributing to cutting-edge projects.

You’ll join an expert annotation team to create training data for for the worlds most advanced AI models. No previous AI experience is necessary. You'll get your foot in the door with one of the biggest players in the AI/LLM space today. We are seeking software engineers with 4+ years of experience to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. We currently have 200+ roles open!

What Will I Be Doing?

  • Evaluating the quality of AI-generated code, including human-readable summaries of your rationale
  • Solve coding problems, writing functional and efficient code
  • Writing robust test cases to confirm code works efficiently and effectively
  • We asked the technical project manager to go into even more detail and this is how he answered: It is solving coding challenges, creating instructions to help others, reviewing the code before it goes into the model, and there's a ton of variety in the projects. We have everything from "which piece of Swift code is better?" to "make a full mobile application using this chatbot, and improve the chatbot's responses afterwards to make it faster"

Contract Length

  • This project is expected to last until the end of September and you'll be able to continue to work on other projects (though likely not in Swift)
  • You can end the contract at any time.

Flexible Schedules

  • Developers can set their own hours - ideal candidates will be interested in spending 15+ hours a week. They will be with teams, so strong performers will adapt to the urgency of projects and stay engaged, but incredibly flexible on working hours.
  • Take a 3 hour lunch, no problem. You are paid according to time spent on the platform, which is calculated in the coding exercises, as opposed to tracking your own hours.

Compensation

  • US: $50 /hr
  • Brazil: $28.70/hr
  • Egypt: $22.05/hr
  • Phillipines: $25.55/hr
  • All other countries: $35/hr
  • Expectations are 15+ hours per week however there is no upper limit. We have engineers working 20-40 hrs per week and some that are working 40+ hours per week. You can work as much as you want to. You'll get paid on a weekly basis. You get paid per hour of work done on the platform.

Interview Process

We've created a 3.5 hour screening and onboarding process to join as a Software Engineer for AI Training Data which can be accomplished in 1 week or less. We purposely perform most of these steps asynchronously because most of the RLHF work is async and self guided. After you apply, if you look like a good fit we'll provide you access to the G2i dashboard to go through this simple screening process.

Step 1: Learn in depth about the role (35 min)

Step 2: Perform a simple RLHF code review (35 min)

Step 3: Receive platform credentials, pass ID verification (5 min), and choose your project (30 min).

Step 4: Perform a production level RLHF task (75 min) "aka the final interview"

Join us: Based on your final interview, you'll will put you on the right difficulty RLHF project

title: Community Lead at Web3 Infrastructure & Gaming Company
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
industries: Non-profit Organizations and Primary and Secondary Education
job_description:
Aethir is revolutionizing DePIN with its advanced, distributed enterprise-grade GPU-based compute infrastructure tailored for AI and gaming. Backed by leading Web3 investors like Framework Ventures, Merit Circle, Hashkey, Animoca Brands, Sanctor Capital, Infinity Ventures Crypto (IVC), and others, with over $140M in funds raised for the ecosystem, Aethir is paving the way for the future of decentralized computing.

We are seeking a Community Lead to join our team. As a Community Lead, you will be responsible for building, engaging and growing our community reaching a wider audience. You will work closely with marketing and customer support teams to set strategy, create engaging content and engage with players through social media and community forums.

Candidates in the APAC region are preferred, but we are open to considering applicants globally.

Responsibilities

  • Develop and execute community engagement strategies
  • Build and maintain community content, calendar and schedule
  • Plan and moderate community-focused events
  • Engage with players by responding to comments and messages
  • Foster and manage a network of influencers
  • Create content consistent with brand messaging and voice
  • Report on metrics, trends and KPIs related to community engagement


Requirements

  • Bachelor's degree in marketing, communications or related field
  • At least 3 years of experience in community management or related roles
  • Passion for and strong knowledge of gaming
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills, including experience creating content for social media
  • Strong project management and team collaboration skills
  • Proficiency in key analytics tools such as Google Analytics
  • Experience with community management software such as Discord and/or Reddit


Benefits

  • Hyper Growth Startup Environment
  • Fantastic Career Progression Opportunities
  • Flexible Working Options
  • Work within a Global and Local Team

title: Campaigns Director/Senior Manager/Manager (Lead Generation)
industries: Non-profit Organizations and Primary and Secondary Education
job_description:
Supermom, a fast-growing AI data powerhouse, has a mission to enable parents and families to live better and smarter in Southeast Asia. Boasting one of the largest family communities in Singapore and expanding fast in Indonesia and Malaysia, as well as other SEA countries, we are now looking for a Campaigns Director/Senior Manager (Lead Generation), to be part of this exciting growth story.

Responsibilities

  • Strategise and create multi-channel marketing plans to deliver on lead generation campaigns for various client accounts. Channels include farming and email/Whatsapp marketing to existing bases, paid advertising, community marketing, events and partnerships, telesales, offline promoters, etc
  • Brief, project manage, and oversee the quality of work from a team of performance specialists, CRM specialists, data processing specialists, copywriters and designers, to deliver on campaigns. If needed, source for suppliers/freelancers and onboard them
  • Forecast budget/CPL and timelines for campaigns
  • Constantly monitor performance across multiple campaigns, and be agile in moving resources across campaigns or changing creatives/channels as needed, understanding drop-out points throughout the journey and troubleshoot accordingly, ultimately ensuring all deliverables are submitted on time and spend is within budget
  • Drive more sophistication in source attribution and performance measurement
  • Understand our target audiences' behaviours, as well as analyse and segment our existing base, to improve new user acquisition and cross-sell
  • Continually find ways to optimise campaigns and maximise margins
  • Build long-term strategies for user acquisition while managing short-term fulfilment
  • Interact directly with clients for day-to-day operations, building positive relationships with them to facilitate renewal or other business opportunities.
  • Responsible for timely billing of clients
  • Be the subject matter expert for omnichannel lead generation campaigns, advising on best practice, feasibility, pricing/CPL, as well as timeline and budget needed for new campaigns/clients


Requirements

  • Minimum 8 years' experience in user acquisition marketing, either with B2C brands or with agencies
  • Minimum 2 years' experience in people management
  • Proven experience in managing successful B2C demand generation programmes
  • Hands-on experience in CRM/lifecycle marketing and/or performance marketing is a big plus
  • Working knowledge of Hubspot and GA4
  • Excellent time management and project management; able to multitask and handle multiple campaigns at the same time
  • Agile when solving a range of implementation or operational issues
  • Good interpersonal skills to deal with different types of clients, internal colleagues and stakeholders
  • Meticulous and detail-oriented
  • Proficient in written and spoken English


Benefits

What we offer

  • Robust compensation package: Base-plus-commissions
  • Bonus plans based on individual, team and/or campaign performances
  • Comprehensive ongoing training and professional development career path programs
  • Team-based workplace dynamic with vibrant talent collaborating toward common objectives and goals

title: Intermediate Machine Learning Engineer
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
job_description:
Our mission and where you fit in

At Employment Hero, we're an ambitious bunch of people on a mission to make employment easier and more valuable for everyone.

Our world-class software is the easiest way for businesses to manage HR, payroll, employee engagement, and benefits.

Since our inception in 2014, we've had some pretty impressive growth (100% YoY), reached unicorn status in 2022, and now serve 300,000 businesses globally, with 2 million+ users on the platform. We have no plans to slow down.

There's never been a more exciting time to join one of the fastest-growing SaaS unicorns, so let's see if we could be a match!

In your role, you'll be focused on

Play a critical role in developing and deploying machine learning models and systems. They bridge the gap between data science and software engineering, applying machine learning algorithms to real-world problems.

Requirements

You're the hero we're looking for if{{:}}

  • Proficiency in a wide range of machine learning algorithms, including supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning, understanding when and how to apply each specific algorithm
  • Knowledge of data preprocessing techniques, including data cleaning and feature engineering
  • Ability to assess model performance using metrics like accuracy, precision, recall, F1-score, and AUC-ROC, and perform hyperparameter tuning to improve model performance
  • Experience in deploying machine learning models to production environments, including containerization (e.g., Docker) and orchestration tools (e.g., Kubernetes), for batch and real-time inference
  • Familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud for scalable and cost-effective model deployment and data storage
  • Strong programming skills in Python and comfortable with common ML libraries like TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn, and Keras
  • Strong software engineering principles, including modular code design, code optimization, and familiarity with software development best practices
  • Proficiency in working with databases, both SQL and NoSQL, to access and manipulate data
  • Knowledge of testing frameworks and practices to ensure model performance and reliability in production


Nice to have skills/ experiences (but not required to be considered){{:}}

  • DevOps practices and tools for reliable and scalable data solutions
  • Experience with Generative AI and libraries like LangChain and LlamaIndex
  • Familiarity with NLP libraries and frameworks like NLTK, spaCy, Gensim, and Hugging Face Transformers for various NLP tasks


Experience is important, but for us the biggest measure of success is people who can live and breathe our values. Show us what you can bring to the table, and we'll empower you to let your talents shine.

Benefits

The EH Way

The EH Way is how we describe our culture at Employment Hero and how we all operate. It is our DNA. You can read all about it on our careers page{{:}} https{{:}}//employmenthero.com/careers/

In short, you'll love working with us if{{:}}

  • Revolutionising employment gets your heart racing
  • You thrive on the flexibility (and responsibility) of a remote-first business
  • Our values align, and shape how you show up every day
  • You love the dynamic pace of a startup, are driven by innovation, and enjoy working with other smart people


But don't just take it from us, hear from your local heroes{{:}} Thao Ta, Head of People and Culture & Hung Pham, Group Engineer Manager{{:}} Life at Employment Hero | Vietnam

Plus, you'll get to enjoy a number of great perks, including{{:}}

  • A generous budget for your home office
  • Cutting-edge tools and technology
  • 20 days Annual Leave, plus VN Public Holidays
  • $500 USD for your professional development plan
  • $500 USD for English learning courses
  • Premium Healthcare Insurance Program for you and your loved ones, plus full gross salary paid social insurance
  • Sports club funded by Employment Hero
  • Monthly get-together event in the office for team bonding and VND 80,000 budget for lunch for day-in-office
  • Reward and recognition programs - because great work should be recognised and rewarded
  • Employee Share Option Program{{:}} be an owner of Employment Hero
  • Annual Global Gathering - so far we've been to Thailand, Vietnam and are excited to meet in Bali in September 2024


Are we a match?

Think we're the right match for you? Fantastic! Click 'Apply' and our talent team will reach out with the next steps.

At Employment Hero, we are committed to safeguarding the privacy of your application data. To understand how we do so, you can read our Applicant Privacy Policy here{{:}} https{{:}}//employmenthero.com/legals/applicant-policy/

Employment Hero celebrates diverse perspectives and experiences, we invite people of all backgrounds and identities to apply for this position.

title: Software Engineer for AI Training Data (Python)
job_description:
Tech Stack

It does not matter which programming language is your primary and we accept engineers with Python (however, you must be willing to work using Swift). Previous Swift experience is not required.

Accepted Locations

We are accepting applicants from the US, Canada, and most countries in LATAM and Europe. We are accepting some countries in Africa and Asia. For the full list of accepted locations, click here. This work is 100% remote.

Loom Video

Our Founder/CEO, Gabe Greenberg, created a more in depth Loom video that we highly recommend you watch! Check it out here: https://www.loom.com/share/5a8972c7fbbf46aaa3f389b2b6391c40

Job Overview

We are currently seeking Developers for project-specific roles focused on RLHF. This role will play a key part in our reinforcement learning from human feedback (RLHF) initiatives, contributing to cutting-edge projects.

You’ll join an expert annotation team to create training data for for the worlds most advanced AI models. No previous AI experience is necessary. You'll get your foot in the door with one of the biggest players in the AI/LLM space today. We are seeking software engineers with 4+ years of experience to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. We currently have 200+ roles open!

What Will I Be Doing?

  • Evaluating the quality of AI-generated code, including human-readable summaries of your rationale
  • Solve coding problems, writing functional and efficient code
  • Writing robust test cases to confirm code works efficiently and effectively
  • We asked the technical project manager to go into even more detail and this is how he answered: It is solving coding challenges, creating instructions to help others, reviewing the code before it goes into the model, and there's a ton of variety in the projects. We have everything from "which piece of Python code is better?" to "make a full mobile application using this chatbot, and improve the chatbot's responses afterwards to make it faster"

Contract Length

  • This project is expected to last until the end of September and you'll be able to continue to work on other projects (though likely not in Swift).
  • You can end the contract at any time.

Flexible Schedules

  • Developers can set their own hours - ideal candidates will be interested in spending 15+ hours a week. They will be with teams, so strong performers will adapt to the urgency of projects and stay engaged, but incredibly flexible on working hours.
  • Take a 3 hour lunch, no problem. You are paid according to time spent on the platform, which is calculated in the coding exercises, as opposed to tracking your own hours.

Compensation

  • US: $50 /hr
  • Brazil: $28.70/hr
  • Egypt: $22.05/hr
  • Phillipines: $25.55/hr
  • All other countries: $35/hr
  • Expectations are 15+ hours per week however there is no upper limit. We have engineers working 20-40 hrs per week and some that are working 40+ hours per week. You can work as much as you want to. You'll get paid on a weekly basis. You get paid per hour of work done on the platform.

Interview Process

We've created a 3.5 hour screening and onboarding process to join as a Software Engineer for AI Training Data which can be accomplished in 1 week or less. We purposely perform most of these steps asynchronously because most of the RLHF work is async and self guided. After you apply, if you look like a good fit we'll provide you access to the G2i dashboard to go through this simple screening process.

Step 1: Learn in depth about the role (35 min)

Step 2: Perform a simple RLHF code review (35 min)

Step 3: Receive platform credentials, pass ID verification (5 min), and choose your project (30 min).

Step 4: Perform a production level RLHF task (75 min) "aka the final interview"

Join us: Based on your final interview, you'll will put you on the right difficulty RLHF project

title: Remote Cloud Backend Engineer
industries: Non-profit Organizations and Primary and Secondary Education
job_description:
Resola Inc, a leading provider of innovative AI solutions for marketing and advertising, is seeking a Sr Backend Engineer to join their dynamic team. This is an exciting opportunity to work in a cutting-edge environment, leveraging AI technology to create user-friendly solutions and improve business operations. As a Sr Backend Engineer, you will be responsible for designing and developing scalable and reliable backend systems that support Resola's AI-powered marketing products and services.

With a strong focus on marketing digital transformation, Resola is at the forefront of utilizing deep learning and natural language processing to enhance customer engagement and conversion rates. As a company that values continuous innovation, Resola offers a supportive work culture and ample opportunities for personal and professional growth.

Note: this is a contractor remote position for engineers from Vietnam, English communication is required given our international team collaborate primary in English.


Responsibilities

  • Design and develop scalable and reliable backend systems for Resola's AI-powered marketing products and services
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and implement features that enhance the performance and functionality of Resola's marketing solutions
  • Optimize backend infrastructure and processes to ensure high availability and scalability
  • Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members
  • Collaborate with data scientists and machine learning engineers to integrate AI algorithms into backend systems
  • Identify and resolve performance bottlenecks and security vulnerabilities in the backend infrastructure
  • Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies to continuously improve Resola's backend systems


Requirements

  • Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or a related field
  • Proven experience designing and developing scalable and reliable backend systems
  • Strong programming skills in languages like Python, Javascript or Go
  • Familiarity with database technologies such as SQL and NoSQL
  • Understanding of RESTful API design principles
  • Experience with cloud platforms like AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure is a plus
  • Knowledge of containerization technologies like Docker and Kubernetes is a plus
  • Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills
  • Strong communication in English and collaboration skills
  • Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced and highly dynamic environment


Benefits

  • Paid Time Off
  • Work From Home
  • Performance Bonus
